page.title: 12NEWSPAPER PIECES ON OUR AREA
page.content: The following items appeared in the {Exmouth Journal}(dated 13th July 1985) This is the local paper for the East Devon area. There were{two pages on St. Peter's {School Centenary celebrations, containing adverts and good wishes from several school suppliers and local firms. { }Other adverts in the paper were : {1)}A firm offering leaflet distribution in the area.{2)}Open Horse Show and Gymkhana at Pink House Corner,Lympstone on Sunday 14th July. {3)}SPL Adventure Holidays at St. Peter's School in July/August.{4)}Four houses for sale in Woodbury at prices from Â£35,000 to Â£50,000.{5)}Free car advertising service in Woodbury.
